name: EducationUSA
info: EducationUSA Advising Center in Almaty opened in October, 2010. Based at American Councils for International Education we offer a variety of face-to-face and virtual advising services to students and educators interested in learning about U.S. higher education. All services are free and include: regularly scheduled introductory presentations on 5 Steps to U.S. study; group and one-on-one consultations; test preparation reference books; diagnostic TOEFL and SAT; regular scholarships and financial aid opportunities updates; pre-departure orientation and intensive preparation summer workshops. Let us know how we can help you make your U.S. university application process successful and we will support you the best we can.

name: ZIYAT
info: Единственный образовательный центр в Казахстане, который предоставляет полную бесплатную консультацию выбора лучшей школы и университета для ВАШЕГО ребенка и готовит к поступлению к ним

name: СпасиBeaucoup
info: Компания была создана в 2013 году на базе французского языка. Основатели - на тот момент 19-летние Асан Паржанов и Улжан Смадияр, основной миссией компании выбрали предоставление качественных услуг по доступным ценам. На сегодняшний день, Компания предлагает изучение 16 мировых языков, поездки во все страны мира, переводческие услуги, и многое другое. Сотрудники являются гордостью и ценностью компании: каждый из них - профессионал своего дела.

name: Alpha Academy
info:
Мы разработали собственные подходы и методику для подготовки студентов к международным экзаменам
и получения гранта

name: AIPLUS
info:
Благодаря нашему 4-х летнему опыту в образовании мы разработали собственную программу для подготовки в НИШ, РФМШ и БИЛ (КТЛ), ЕНТ, а также в специализированные лицеи №165, №39, №90 и №134.

Наш центр имеет огромный книжный фонд, разработанный нашими руководителями и тренерами.

name: Stargate Origins
info: Stargate Origins (abbreviated as SGO) is an American science fiction adventure web series and part of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayers Stargate franchise. The program is based on the 1994 science fiction film Stargate by Dean Devlin and Roland Emmerich and its spin-off Stargate SG-1. It was announced on July 20, 2017 at the 2017 San Diego Comic Con as part of Stargate SG-1s 20th anniversary celebration. The series consists of 10 episodes, each 10 minutes in length, essentially a 10-episode feature length movie, and expands upon the existing mythology of the Stargate franchise. Stargate Origins premiered with 3 episodes on February 14, 2018 on MGM's 'Stargate Command' subscription service. A 104 minutes long ‘Feature Cut‘ titled Stargate Origins: Catherine was released on June 19, 2018 on digital retail outlets around the world in SD, HD, and 4K formats. ‘Feature Cut‘ additions include a fresh sound mix, enhanced visual effects, a new title sequence, and subtitles in 12 different languages.

name: Stargate Infinity
info: Stargate Infinity (often abbreviated as SGI or just Infinity) is an American animated science fiction television series and part of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayers (MGM) Stargate franchise, but is not considered official Stargate canon. The show was created by Eric Lewald and Michael Maliani, as a spin-off series of Stargate SG-1, which was created by Brad Wright and Jonathan Glassner in 1997 after the release of the original film, Stargate (1994) by Dean Devlin and Roland Emmerich. The animation had a low viewership rating and poor reception; it was canceled after one season. It was co-produced by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Animation and DIC Entertainment (now DHX Media) and directed by Will Meugniot.
